About.title: About Us
About.heroSubtitle: We believe financial intelligence shouldn't be locked behind paywalls. OpenStock is built by the community, for the community.
About.openAccessDesc: No premium tiers for core features. Real-time data and insights available to all, forever.
About.openSourceDesc: Fully transparent codebase. Audit our algorithms, contribute features, and build with us.
About.communityDrivenDesc: Powered by donations and volunteers. We answer to our users, not shareholders.
About.ourStoryDesc1: OpenStock was born from a simple frustration: why are powerful financial tools so expensive?
About.ourStoryDesc2: We are a collective of developers, designers, and financial enthusiasts working under the Open Dev Society banner. Our mission is to democratize software by building high-quality, open-source alternatives to proprietary platforms.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.subtitle: Built on trust, transparency, and community values. No hidden gotchas, just clear rules.
Terms.promise1: Core features will remain free forever.
Terms.promise2: We will never sell your personal data.
Terms.promise3: Terms changes will be discussed openly.
Terms.promise4: You own your watchlists and analysis.
Terms.disclaimerBody: OpenStock is an educational and analysis tool, not a financial advisor. Data is provided "as is" for informational purposes. Never invest money you cannot afford to lose. Always conduct your own research or consult a certified professional before making financial decisions.

ApiDocs.title: OpenStock Architecture
ApiDocs.subtitle: A transparent look at the event-driven, multi-provider system powering your market insights.
ApiDocs.intelligentUIDesc: We prioritize uptime for generative features (Welcome Emails, News Summaries) using a robust multi-provider strategy. Our system automatically routes around outages.
ApiDocs.primaryAIDesc: Handles high-volume inference for news summarization and personalization.
ApiDocs.fallbackAIDesc: Instant failover protection. If Gemini wavers, Siray takes over to ensure zero dropped requests.
ApiDocs.job1Desc: Generates personalized welcome/onboarding email via AI.
ApiDocs.job2Desc: Summarizes market news and broadcasts via ConvertKit.
ApiDocs.job3Desc: Checks user price targets against real-time data.
ApiDocs.job4Desc: Identifies dormant users and sends nudges.
ApiDocs.finnhubDesc: Real-time quotes, technical indicators, and market news.
ApiDocs.kitDesc: High-volume newsletter broadcasts and user tagging.
ApiDocs.mongoDesc: Distributed data on AWS. SRV-bypassed connection for maximum reliability.
